content.rendered:
Meetings begin at 7 p.m. unless otherwise noted.   Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.

July 7, 2025: Organization Meeting (Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223) Time: 8:00 a.m.

  • Watch the meeting through youtube

July 24, 2025: Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223

  • Watch the meeting through youtube

August 21, 2025: Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223

  • 6:30 p.m.: Executive Session
  • 7:00 p.m.:  Regular Meeting
  • Watch the meeting through youtube

September 11, 2025: Greenfield Elementary School 

  • 7:00 p.m.:  Regular Meeting
  • Watch the meeting through youtube

September 25, 2025: Division Street Elementary School

October 9, 2025: Caroline Street Elementary School & Building Tour

October 21, 2025: Lake Avenue Elementary School & Building Tour

November 13, 2025: Dorothy Nolan Elementary School & Building Tour

December 11, 2025: Geyser Road Elementary School & Building Tour

January 8, 2026: Maple Avenue Middle School & Building Tour

January 22, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School & Building Tour

February 12, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

February 26, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

March 5, 2026: 6:30 Budget Workshop: Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223

March 12, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

March 19, 2026 6:30 Budget Workshop: Administration Building – Conference Rooms #221-223

March 26, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

April 16, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School (budget adoption date)

May 7, 2026: 6:30 Budget Hearing: Followed by a Regular Meeting
Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

May 13, 2026:  Tentative Meet the Candidates Hosted by the League of Women Voters  Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School 

May 19, 2026: School Budget Vote and Board Election: Robert S. Meade Auditorium

May 20, 2026: Robert S. Meade Auditorium – High School

June 11, 2026: Project Based Learning Center – High School

June 25, 2026:  Project Based Learning Center – High School
